events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified this case as related to a refund request due to a wrong item delivery.
Your case has been assigned to an agent specialized in refund processing for faster help.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Let me assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 98234567 and I have attached a photo of the item I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate your quick handling of this refund request.
Your refund request has been completed successfully and no further action is needed on your part.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything was resolved satisfactorily.
Since we have not heard back from you, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you have further questions.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience.
